divs: Sighting Details 1. I was driving home late from state park training. 2. I saw some lights out the side of my window as I was driving. 3. I didn't know what it was. I thought it could be a huge helicopter are first. But it wasn't like any chopper or any hover craft I have ever seen. (I was in the Navy for 6 years and I have spent alot of time around vertical take off aircraft; harrier jump jets, helicopters,etc.) 4. It looked about 1 mile away slowly hovering over the treetops.I couldnt really make out the shape but it was big. It did have depth though. I could see what looked like running lights around the edges. It could have been triangle shaped but I really could not tell. It seemed to match the night sky in color, save for the lights. 5. I pulled over in my car and turned of the engine to see if I could hear it. I could not hear anything. I got out of my car to see if I could hear it better but I still heard nothing. 6. After about 5 minutes of watching it I gave up tring to figure it out and got back in my car and went home. PS: After working around military aircarft for 6 years I am not ashamed to say that I still don't know what it was. Any ideas ?please contact me.

Summary: It appeared to be a silent flying craft of large size hovering and slowly moving at about 1mile distance . It had lights around sides and was over tree top level.
